name: Stay Away Simulator
description:
What is this game?

"Stay Away Simulator" is a small Unreal engine game created for the CCCUIso Jam. 

What do you do?

In Stay Away Simulator you use your energy gun to fight off enemies that want to touch and absorb you, there is no win condition, you survive as long as you can till you eventually lose. 

Will the game get any future updates?

Unfortunately I do not think I will be coming back to this game. Even though we had 10 days to work on this project, I only had around 5 due to complications with my home life during the current crisis. I've decided to release the Trello board I created so people can see the ideas I had for the game if they are curious and maybe in the future I'll create a game similar to this one with all the features I wanted to add.

Special thanks:

I just want to say a huge thank you to the organisers of the game jam, this current crisis has been a tough time for myself, as well as many others and having the opportunity to work on something that can bring some normalcy to our lives at this time has been a lot of fun and a welcome break.

Links:
